page.title: 03Looking after the church
page.content: Much work and money is needed to keep the church clean and in good repair.There are 72 ladies on the cleaning rota. Most recently repairs have been the replacing of the floorboards with heating put in under the new ones. The church used to have 5 bells which wehe heaviest in Buckinghamshire. However the wooden bell frame rotted andhad to be replaced with a metal one. There is now a full complement of 8 bells.There are about 12 bellringers with 2 or 3 more learning the art. Because some of the bells are smaller and lighter younger people can now learn to ring them. Various activites are held to raise money for church repairs.
